attributes.name: config-id
attributes.description:
***Mandatory***
ID of the QR configuration to display

attributes.name: config-repository
attributes.description:
___Optional___
ConfigURL Repository to download the config from

description.value:
This component built using stencyl allows an easy integration to display a gataca QR to be read by the wallet.

This component can be used with the prerequisite of having an application which can be integrated with GATACA Components: Connect and Certify. More precisely, your application will need to be able to perform the two operations against your connect or certify servers:

1. Create sessions
2. Consult sessions

attributes.name: autorefresh
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
Set to refresh the session automatically upon expiration. By default it is false

attributes.name: autostart
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
Set to enable autoload when the QR is displayed. By default it is true

attributes.name: by-brand-label
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
String to show "by brand" label

attributes.name: callback-server
attributes.description:
***Mandatory just for V1***
Connect/Certify Server where the wallet will send the data

attributes.name: click-inside-box-label
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
String to show "click inside" label

attributes.name: credentials-not-validated-label
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
String to show when credentials not validatedd

attributes.name: creds-not-validated-error-label
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
String to show "provided credentials not validates" error

attributes.name: dynamic-link
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
Display a link containing a dynamic link to invoke the wallet if closed

attributes.name: failed-login-error-label
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
String to show "failed login" error

attributes.name: hide-brand-title
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
Boolean to show or not show the gataca brand title

attributes.name: hide-modal-box-shadow
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
Boolean to show or not show the modal title, brandTitle and description

attributes.name: hide-modal-texts
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
Boolean to show or not show the modal title, brandTitle and description

attributes.name: hide-qr-modal-description
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
Boolean to show or not show the QR Modal description

attributes.name: logo-size
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
Size of the logo to display in percentage to the total size [0-1]. 0 means no logo will be displayed. Default is the GATACA logo. Recommended size is around 0.33

attributes.name: logo-src
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
Logo to display, just if the logo size is greater than 0. No logo is the GATACA logo.

attributes.name: modal-height
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
Height of the modal

attributes.name: modal-title-color
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
String to set Modal title color

attributes.name: modal-width
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
Width of the modal

attributes.name: polling-frequency
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
Frequency in seconds to check if the session has been validated

attributes.name: qr-code-expired-label
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
String to show when qr code expired

attributes.name: qr-modal-description
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
Modifies the Modal description

attributes.name: qr-modal-title
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
Modifies the qr headline title

attributes.name: qr-role
attributes.description:
***Mandatory just for V1***
Decide if scanning the credential as a verifier to request credentials
or as an issuer too issue credentials.
Options: connect | certify

attributes.name: qr-size
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
Size of QR Displayed

attributes.name: read-qr-description
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
String description to show when QR already read

attributes.name: read-qr-title
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
String title to show when QR already read

attributes.name: refresh-qr-label
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
String to show "refresh QR" label

attributes.name: scan-qr-label
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
String to show "scan QR" label

attributes.name: session-timeout
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
Maximum time window to display the session

attributes.name: success-login-label
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
String to show "successful login" label

attributes.name: user-not-scan-in-time-error-label
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
String to show "user not scan in time" error

attributes.name: v
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
If 3, handle deeplink redirects and deprecates (remove) v1 functionality. If not, the create session must be providing both an authentication request and a session Id

attributes.name: waiting-start-session-label
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
String to show "waiting start session" label

description.value:
This component built using stencyl allows an easy integration to display a QR with the gataca styles Continuing with that example, you could integrate in any HTML using the following code ```html Gataca QR Display Component
```

description.value:
This component built using stencyl allows an easy integration to display a "Quick SSI Access Button", with a similar to the current existing sign-in buttons for OAuth2 providers like Google, Twitter or Facebook.

This component wraps the logic to display and hide a Gataca-QR component under a button. To configure and integrate it, you need to follow the same process as the basic [Gataca-QR component](../gataca-qr/readme.md).

This component can be used with the prerequisite of having an application which can be integrated with GATACA Components: Connect and Certify. More precisely, your application will need to be able to perform the two operations against your connect or certify servers:

1. Create sessions
2. Consult sessions

attributes.name: autorefresh
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
Set to refresh the session automatically upon expiration. By default it is false

attributes.name: button-text
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
In the case of being a button, modifies its text

attributes.name: by-brand-label
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
String to show "by brand" label

attributes.name: callback-server
attributes.description:
***Mandatory just for V1***
Connect/Certify Server where the wallet will send the data

attributes.name: click-inside-box-label
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
String to show "click inside" label

attributes.name: credentials-not-validated-label
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
String to show when credentials not validatedd

attributes.name: creds-not-validated-error-label
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
String to show "provided credentials not validates" error

attributes.name: dynamic-link
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
Display a link containing a dynamic link to invoke the wallet if closed

attributes.name: failed-login-error-label
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
String to show "failed login" error

_[Optional]_

attributes.name: hide-qr-modal-description

Size of the logo to display in percentage to the total size [0-1]. 0 means no logo will be displayed. Default is the GATACA logo. Recommended size is around 0.33

_[Optional]_
Logo to display, just if the logo size is greater than 0. No logo is the GATACA logo.

attributes.name: modal-title-color

attributes.name: polling-frequency
attributes.description:
_[Optional]_
Frequency in seconds to check if the session has been validated

attributes.name: qr-code-expired-label

attributes.description:

attributes.name: qr-modal-title

attributes.name: qr-role
attributes.description:
***Mandatory***
Decide if scanning the credential as a verifier to request credentials
or as an issuer too issue credentials.
Options: connect | certify

_[Optional]_

String to show "waiting start session" label

_[Optional]_
Set to refresh the session automatically upon expiration. By default it is false

Options: connect | certify

***Mandatory***
Maximum time window to display the session and keep the websocket connection. It's needed to ensure the socket is closed.
